summary: Make your text appear as animated Christmas lights
name: xmaslights.vim
description: xmaslights.vim is a Python script for Vim that make your text appear as animated Christmas lights.  It changes the color of the different syntax highliting components randomly on a timer/loop.  It was tested with the win32 gvim binary and may need modification to work on other platforms.
install_details:
Save the file to your .vim/plugins directory or load it with :source xmaslights.vim .

start it in vim with the command ":py xmas()"
